text: today's recipe isn't so much a recipe as
a great new way to serve your morning
grant fruit in this bowl I have a
quarter cup of grapefruit juice and I'm
adding just two tablespoons of brown
sugar and then I'm just gonna cut up my
grapefruit you can cut it however you
like I think it's really beautiful if
you just cut it in two rounds
it's just an elegant way to serve it but
you can also supreme' if you want to
remove the peel and the pith from your
grapefruit such a great scent it's so
refreshing smelling and then just slice
it into rounds remove the seeds and then
you can put your grapefruit in a bowl a
couple of slices sprinkle with some
chopped pistachios a really nice
combination if you haven't tried it I
think this is a great place to do it and
then just drizzle with some of this
juice you're making almost like a little
breakfast soup
you don't want that much because it is
sweetened and if you don't like too much
sweetness just use the grapefruit juice
and less sugar there's a quarter cup and
2 tablespoons so you could do less let
me show you how to supreme because it's
actually my really favorite way to eat
grapefruit so remove the ends same way
you did before there's something super
luxurious about having somebody hand you
a bowl of supremacist make sure that
your knife is really sharp this doesn't
work very well if it isn't cut between
the membranes allowing the grapefruit
segments to just drop into the ball see
how that some juice is dripping down my
hand into the bowl make sure you're
doing it right over the bowl that you're
serving it in and then just squeeze all
the juice see that oh yeah and then
because I didn't have any I don't have
any more sugar I'm just gonna spoon a
little bit of this additional juice over
the top but you could just sprinkle this
with your brown sugar and get the same
effect but don't forget the pistachios
because that's what makes this breakfast
special well aside from these amazing
luxurious
crumbs and there you have it grapefruit
two fantastic ways
